alert.note: Alert for Coastal Ocean; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 28 at 12:57PM EST until December 29 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in mainly the backbays and inlets including Barnegat Bay . * WHERE...Ocean and Coastal Ocean. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels along the oceanfront have receded below advisory levels however water remains trapped in Barnegat Bay and will likely remain at or above Advisory levels through the next high tide cycle. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Barnegat Bay at Barnegat Light MLLW Categories - Minor 3.5 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.0 ft, Moderate 2.0 ft, Major 3.0 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 28/09 PM 3.0 0.5 1.2 None 29/09 AM 3.6 1.1 1.2 Minor 29/09 PM 2.8 0.3 1.1 None 30/10 AM 3.2 0.7 0.9 None 30/10 PM 2.2 -0.3 0.5 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
